content.question: Which of the following best explains the contemporary development of the theory of absolutism in France, which contrasted sharply with Lockeâ€™s views on popular sovereignty?

choices.label: The greater size of the French population in the seventeenth century
The lack of any successful challenges to monarchical power in seventeenth-century France
The greater success of England in establishing overseas colonies in the seventeenth century
The continued existence of a substantial Protestant minority in seventeenth-century France

content.answer: The lack of any successful challenges to monarchical power in seventeenth-century France

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
